name: Chimera breeding
description:
Become a monster and attack the heroine!
An action game that loops through 3 days with everything!

Explore the MAP, find the heroine, and give in to the battle!
Chimera that changes its appearance freely in the H scene
Breeding scenes of bestiality, tactile rape, insect rape, or even machine rape

Even with the same heroine, the content of the breeding scene changes depending on the behavior
I tried to let the child who was crying for forced copulation slowly drop the pleasure with a tentacle attack
Depending on the development, there are also non-human daughters and human children who can breed with each other.

There are 12 heroines, and the stage is a kingdom that will be destroyed by outsiders three days later.
Princesses, princess knights, elves, dragon girls, demons, dryads, fairies, etc.
You can fully enjoy breeding with various races

You can randomly attack the female
You can attack either the human side or the human side camp and change the ending of the kingdom and the heroine.
You can fight for just one heroine
It is a breeding activity that becomes a chimera for 3 days that loops as you wish!
